name: 洪子逸
objective: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
schedule:
1 Course Introduction
2 What Is Strategy and Why Is It Important?
3 The Strategic Management Process
4 External Analysis: Industry Structure, Competitive Forces, and Strategic Groups
5 Internal Analysis: Resources, Capabilities, and Activities
6 Competitive Advantage and Firm Performance
7 Business Strategy: Differentiation, Cost Leadership, and Integration
8 Business Strategy: Innovation and Strategic Entrepreneurship
9 Midterm Exam/Proposal
10 Corporate Strategy: Vertical Integration and Diversification
11 Corporate Strategy: Acquisitions, Alliances, and Networks
12 Global Strategy: Competing Around the World
13 Organizational Design: Structure, Culture, and Control
14 Corporate Governance, Business Ethics, and Strategic Leadership
15 Case Study I
16 Case Study II
17 Case Study III
18 Final Exam/Project
scorePolicy:
35%: In-class Performance
30%: Midterm Exam/Proposal
35%: Final Exam/Project
